title: Mixed-Methods Research-Based Project Learning for E-Learning Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical knowledge and fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: Project-based learning where professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields apply mathematical problem-solving to real workplace scenarios, utilizing flexible BYOD learning environments

learning_goals: Write a project report analyzing e-learning PD effectiveness using mixed research methods (quantitative + qualitative)
Propose three or more e-learning tool integration plans when designing math PBL activities based on peer feedback
Present a case study on how organizational structure and personal time management influence e-learning PD participation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
